mapper.select: SELECT dictName,y2017,y2018,y2019,y2020,y2021 FROM( SELECT 'y'+SUBSTRING(di.RecordDate,0,5) AS year,d.DictName,di.SourceId,d.DictOrder FROM TB_BASE_DANGERSOURCE_INFO di RIGHT JOIN TB_SYS_DATADICT d ON di.Rank = d.DictId WHERE d.TypeId = '8ea8562f-e58b-461c-9485-a967bc5e29ca') AS t pivot(COUNT(t.SourceId) FOR t.year IN(y2017,y2018,y2019,y2020,y2021)) AS t1 ORDER BY DictOrder

SELECT dictName,convert(VARCHAR,y2017)+','+convert(VARCHAR,y2017+y2018)+ ','+convert(VARCHAR,y2017+y2018+y2019)+','+convert(VARCHAR,y2017+y2018+y2019+y2020)+ ','+convert(VARCHAR,y2017+y2018+y2019+y2020+y2021) AS num FROM(SELECT d.DictName,d.DictOrder,di.SourceId,'y'+SUBSTRING(di.RecordDate,0,5) AS year FROM TB_BASE_DANGERSOURCE_INFO di RIGHT JOIN TB_SYS_DATADICT d ON di.Rank = d.DictId WHERE d.TypeId = '8ea8562f-e58b-461c-9485-a967bc5e29ca') AS t PIVOT(COUNT(t.SourceId) for t.year IN (y2017,y2018,y2019,y2020,y2021)) AS t1 ORDER BY DictOrder

SELECT dictName, y2017,y2018,y2019,y2020,y2021 FROM (SELECT sd.DictName,sd.DictOrder,rda.RelationId,'y'+SUBSTRING(bdi.RecordDate,0,5) AS year FROM TB_REL_DRESOURCE_ACCIDENTYPE rda JOIN TB_BASE_DANGERSOURCE_INFO bdi ON bdi.SourceId=rda.SourceId RIGHT JOIN TB_SYS_DATADICT sd ON sd.DictId=rda.TypeId WHERE sd.TypeId='61c44efb-ec19-4f92-9c47-507dee5b4bbe') AS t pivot(COUNT(t.RelationId) for t.year in (y2017,y2018,y2019,y2020,y2021)) AS pvt ORDER BY DictOrder

SELECT COUNT(rda.RelationId) AS num,sd.dictName FROM TB_REL_DRESOURCE_ACCIDENTYPE rda JOIN TB_BASE_DANGERSOURCE_INFO di ON di.SourceId=rda.SourceId AND Rank=#{rank} RIGHT JOIN TB_SYS_DATADICT sd ON rda.TypeId=sd.DictId WHERE sd.TypeId='61c44efb-ec19-4f92-9c47-507dee5b4bbe' GROUP BY sd.DictName,sd.DictOrder

SELECT COUNT(bdi.SourceId) AS num,sd.dictName FROM TB_BASE_DANGERSOURCE_INFO bdi JOIN TB_BASE_COMPANY_INFO bci ON bci.CompanyId=bdi.CompanyId RIGHT JOIN TB_SYS_DATADICT sd ON sd.DictId=bci.StandardRank WHERE sd.TypeId='3aed6882-2f35-4949-a9ab-e60a9fb6a049' GROUP BY sd.DictName,sd.DictId,sd.DictOrder ORDER BY sd.DictOrder

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT sd2.DictId AS typeId,sd2.DictName AS typeName,sd2.dictOrder,'等级' AS stack, STUFF((SELECT ',' + CAST (COUNT (rda.RelationId) AS VARCHAR) FROM TB_SYS_DATADICT sd LEFT JOIN TB_BASE_COMPANY_INFO ci ON sd.DictId = ci.DirectArea LEFT JOIN TB_BASE_DANGERSOURCE_INFO di ON ci.CompanyId=di.CompanyId AND di.Rank=sd2.DictId LEFT JOIN TB_REL_DRESOURCE_ACCIDENTYPE rda ON rda.SourceId=di.SourceId AND rda.TypeId=#{typeId} WHERE sd.TypeId = '8b4524ce-15cf-404a-8182-a7e8a8d68343' GROUP BY sd.DictId,sd.DictName,sd.DictOrder ORDER BY sd.DictOrder FOR xml path ('')),1,1,'') AS numList FROM TB_SYS_DATADICT sd2 WHERE sd2.TypeId = '8ea8562f-e58b-461c-9485-a967bc5e29ca') AS t ORDER BY dictOrder

SELECT dictName,SUM(a) AS a,SUM(b) AS b, SUM(c) AS c,SUM(d) AS d FROM ( SELECT sd.dictName,CASE WHEN bdi.DeathToll < 10 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS 'a', CASE WHEN bdi.DeathToll > =10 AND bdi.DeathToll < 30 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS 'b', CASE WHEN bdi.DeathToll > =30 AND bdi.DeathToll < 100 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS 'c', CASE WHEN bdi.DeathToll > =100 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS 'd', bdi.DeathToll,sd.dictOrder FROM TB_BASE_DANGERSOURCE_INFO bdi JOIN TB_BASE_COMPANY_INFO bci ON bdi.CompanyId=bci.CompanyId AND bdi.DeathToll !=0 AND bdi.DeathToll IS NOT NULL AND bdi.DeathToll != '' RIGHT JOIN TB_SYS_DATADICT sd ON sd.DictId= bci.DirectArea WHERE sd.TypeId='8b4524ce-15cf-404a-8182-a7e8a8d68343') AS t GROUP BY dictName,dictOrder
